 <font size = "6" color = "blue"> SOUTH BEND DASHBOARD </font>

 The main goal of this project is to <font size="4" color="red"> create a dashboard to show the parks, schools, business and abandoned lots in South Bend. </font> 
 <br>
 The user will be able to filter by zip code and can use additional filter on each of the tabs. 
 <br>
 
 There are three Sections of the Dashboard.
 Secion 1 - Parks and Schools
 Section 2 - Businesses and Abandoned Lots
 Section 3 - Summary Data
 
 The user will be able to zoom in/out on the map based on their selection and can see what is nearby.
